DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect high protein high carbohydrate breakfast glucose insulin response follow breakfast meal , well subsequent response follow lunch meal .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Breakfast Composition Glycemic Incretin Responses Individuals With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Twelve habitual breakfast consumer type 2 diabetes ( T2D ) recruit study . They complete two , 7-day condition random order minimum 7-day washout period study day . They consume either high protein ( PRO ) high carbohydrate ( CHO ) breakfast 6 day acclimatization , seventh day , report lab 0700 hour follow ~12 hour overnight fast underwent forearm catheterization baseline blood draw . The participant consume respective breakfast ~0730 hour . Four hour post-breakfast , subject consume standard lunch meal . Blood sample take continuously throughout 8-hour test day .
DOC.criteria: 2155 age body mass index ( BMI ) 3040 kg/m2 weight stable prior 6 month nonsmoker minimal alcohol consumption ( < 2 drink per day ) type 2 diabetic ( diagnosed ≥ 2 ) fast glucose level 120 mg/dL HbA1c 6.59.0 % insulin βblockers GLP1 agonist ( e.g . exenatide ) dipeptidyl peptidase ( DPP ) inhibitor weight loss use weightloss medication pregnant lactate
